src.data.train.train

Helper functions for building the training data.

src.data.train.train.build_train(games_cols, raw_games_path, features_path)[source]

Build the training data.

Parameters:

  • games_cols (list) – columns to keep

  • raw_games_path (str) – path to raw games data

  • features_path (str) – path to features directory

Returns:

None

Return type:

None

src.data.train.train.merge_feature(train, feature)[source]

Merge a feature into the training data.

Parameters:

  • train (pd.DataFrame) – training data

  • feature (pd.DataFrame) – feature data

Returns:

training data with feature merged in

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

src.data.train.train.preprocess_raw_games(games)[source]

Reduce the games dataframe.

Parameters:

games (pd.DataFrame) – raw games dataframe

Returns:

reduced games data

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

src.data.train.train.reduce_training_cols(games, games_cols)[source]

Reduce the games data to only the columns that will be used for training.

Parameters:

  • games (pd.DataFrame) – games data

  • games_cols (list) – columns to keep

Returns:

games data with reduced columns

Return type:

pd.DataFrame
